name: Moratorium
flavorText: Precious stones can sometimes be found among the peaks of Ivgorod. The harmonics of these gems, while in combat, are said to forestall death itself.
flavorTextHtml: Precious stones can sometimes be found among the peaks of Ivgorod. The harmonics of these gems, while in combat, are said to forestall death itself.

secondary.textHtml: 35% of all damage taken is instead staggered and dealt to you over 3.00 seconds. 3.00
